room_title: Escape room "Panacea" by Room Escapers in Boston
room_description:
Alchemy. An aged science, but our last hope. The planet is in a dire situation. An incurable disease has been released by the melting permafrost and is quickly making rounds on humanity. Our last chance is to find a cure-all medicine of old. The Panacea.
One of the most plausible locations of the antidote is in a forgotten chamber of an apothecary located in downtown Boston. Act quickly; you have all been infected, and you’re humanity’s last chance for survival!
